name: Brandon Hernandez
bio: Brandon Hernandez, a dynamic Right Back for Everglade FC, dazzles fans with his blistering pace and fearless tackles. Proud of his Miami roots, he embodies the bustling spirit of the Everglades, often igniting the pitch with his relentless energy and flair. At just 17, his maturity on the field is impressive, making him a vital part of the team’s fast-paced play.
